name: Luca Princiotta
description:
'''Luca Princiotta''' (born 12 July 1982) is an Italian guitarist. He began his career playing in the [[thrash metal]] band Deathector between 1996 and 1998, before joining the [[Iron Maiden]] tribute band Clairvoyants. His most prominent role to date has been in [[Blaze (metal band)|Blaze]] (the band of former Maiden frontman [[Blaze Bayley]]) as a replacement for their departed founding guitarist Steve Wray. Originally employed as a tour musician, he was eventually hired on a permanent basis; he contributed to the songwriting of the band's upcoming album before departing in January 2007.

In June 2006 he was hired by the German heavy metal singer [[Doro (musician)|Doro]] to replace the band's guitarist (and his then-Blaze bandmate) [[Oliver Palotai]] in some European gigs. In 2008, he became a stable member.
